text: Fox Sports reporter Erin Andrews and former NHL player Jarret Stoll got married on Saturday at Yellowstone Club in Montana, according to People. com. The couple had been dating since 2012 and announced their engagement back in December of 2016. The ceremony was held on a mountainside at the resort near Yellowstone National Park with guests like Joe Buck and Michael Strahan in attendance.
